cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: ... I want to praise(?), your alone ...
... is bearing an aura, possession radiance
... the enemy did not make its way straight/do ... properly on your behalf(?)
And therefore the ... of your supreme ... overwhelm them(?)
Alas, your name, holy An(?) alas, your name
Your supremacy and praise(?) ... the enemy(!?) shall not approach(?)
Great Mountain(?), shepherd of the land and the black-headed
Enlil, your command decides a great fate
Supreme flood(?) which cannot be withstood/rivaled(?)
Supreme ... Nunamnir, your command covers (like) a flood(?)
... is ..., and therefore(?) it will rock the earth
Fierce/reddish god clad in an aura, NinIsina
The fierce enemy, who Shulgi has not (yet) seized
And therefore the one who exudes anger(?), when she terrifies like a wave, ... from above
(Her) great weapon(!)/intelligence(!)(?) (of?) capital punishment/death, the craft of the physician, splits(?) through the gore/viscera(?)
... she prowls(?), the naming of (her) name fills/silences (everything)(!?)
Like/as the ... of(?) an enemy ... may ...
... when you(?) terrify like a storm(?) ...(?)
... the Å¡ita/udug weapon, mitum weapon, your great weapons, defeat(?) ... smites(?)
